I use 1.3.0 on Windows XP to do a broadscape crawl, and use 
MirrorWriter to store the downloaded resource. after a period of time, 
some errors appear, java.io.Exception: Can not mkdir ...

I found there're already 23985 subdirectories in the "mirror" 
directory, and there's still 1.5G free disk space. I guess it reaches 
some limitation.

How can I do?


thanks
